title: Lol so Tryndamere support is getting spammed in Diamond+ now.
body:
This needs to stop existing. It is one of the most infuriating things to face both in and out of lane. Game after game I'm seeing more and more people pick this up. Clearly it isn't hard to play if everyone and their goldfish are able to just pick it and play it like its their main. 

45% CDR w max Tryndamere is broken and is in desperate need of nerfs. This is getting out of hand now.

http://puu.sh/o3Sve/91bbb8e780.jpg

sigh.
